hotels.title: Korea: Jeju Island Sky-High Grandeur with Onsite Dining, Two Spas & Rooftop Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Perched on South Korea's enchanting island paradise, Grand Hyatt Jeju is a coastal sanctuary that captures Jeju's natural splendour while offering an unparalleled escape. Twelve restaurants and bars showcase local and international cuisine, while the two spas invite you to indulge like never before. Discover island tranquility that showcases Jeju's unique charm while cocooning you in sophisticated comfort, where a rooftop infinity pool creates a shimmering oasis against the island backdrop. Whether exploring the island's volcanic wonders or sampling local seafood, you'll return to a hotel that balances adventure with indulgence.
